person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: He guided Ireland to two successive World Cup finals tournaments and to the 1988 European championship finals in Germany , after the Irish beat a well-fancied England team 1-0 in their group qualifier .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| He    |
| Ireland |

The paragraph does not mention any specific named persons, only "He" who guided Ireland to the tournaments, and "Ireland" as the team.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| He    |

The paragraph only mentions "He" as a person, and the other entities mentioned do not clearly refer to persons.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: He guided Ireland to two successive World Cup finals tournaments and to the 1988 European championship finals in Germany , after the Irish beat a well-fancied England team 1-0 in their group qualifier .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Ireland |
| FIFA (implied through "World Cup") |

In this paragraph, "Ireland" is the organization that was guided to the World Cup finals tournaments and the European championship finals. The paragraph mentions "FIFA" implicitly through "World Cup," so it is included as an implied organization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Ireland |
| FIFA |

In the paragraph, "Ireland" and "FIFA" are the clear organizations mentioned. "World Cup" refers to a specific tournament organized by FIFA, so it is appropriate to include FIFA as an organization in this context.
